author: Jeff Geerling
description:
Thanks to Micro Center for sponsoring this video!

Micro Center Santa Clara: https://micro.center/9d2732
Shop Micro Center’s Selection of Boards and Projects: https://micro.center/2c0426
Shop Micro Center’s Selection of Maker/ STEM Products: https://micro.center/cf245a
Shop Micro Center’s Laptop Savings Event: https://micro.center/79e60d

Thanks especially to everyone I met in Santa Clara for helping make this video happen! For all the code used in the demos, check out this GitHub Gist:

https://gist.github.com/geerlingguy/4d519887aeb462ba9501961a32ae3f71

Resources mentioned in this video:

  - Steve Wozniak on the relay: https://youtu.be/hsB8Hxnb52o?t=367
  - Open Circuits: https://amzn.to/446b9pb
  - PicoBricks Base Kit: https://amzn.to/4jUv7sI (also check Micro Center for availability)
  - PicoBricks IDE: https://picobricks.com/pages/ide?ose=false
  - MicroBlocks IDE: https://microblocks.fun

Other YouTube channels I follow for microcontrollers and electronics:

  - ElectroBOOM: h
title: Making tiny explosions with microcontrollers
